posts.content:
I will probably regret this but I have a full set of 15” bus steels date matched feb 62 same as my bus.
Iv changed to alloys now and I can’t see myself going back to the steels so they may as well be sold on.
Apart from being rattle can painted black over the white they are actually in good condition. Very straight and solid.
2 are fitted with 185 65 15s that have plenty on tread left and the other 2 are bare steels.
Looking for £300.
Located in Eastbourne.

I also have a set of large logo caps that I may also sell if the buyer is interested.

Here are the wheels anyway, feel free to ask questions.
